sentences.english: Why do male robins have red breasts?
sentences.chinese: 为什么雄性欧亚鸲胸部呈红色？

sentences.english: Water-loving birds, like redstarts and forktails are busy attending to their hungry nestlings .
sentences.chinese: 喜水的鸟如红尾鸲和燕尾鸟忙于喂食他们饥饿的雏鸟。

sentences.english: Phoenicurus auroreus auroreus is a summer resident bird in Liaoning province, its resident period is more than half a year.
sentences.chinese: 北红尾鸲在辽宁省为夏候鸟，居留期长达半年。
